text: betfair stopped sending back correct positions, I was stupidly trying to exit (used to hedge ast the time) a position using betangel auto features. It sent the hedge / counter bet up, no response in the order stream came, so it re-fired, then kept doing it. Then the market goes inplay and suddenly like 3 seconds into the race it shows up and im overhedged about 7k and the horse which I thought had a good chance of winning / was value strolled to the front and the price collapsed IP.

elements.text: betfair stopped sending back correct positions, I was stupidly trying to exit (used to hedge ast the time) a position using betangel auto features. It sent the hedge / counter bet up, no response in the order stream came, so it re-fired, then kept doing it. Then the market goes inplay and suddenly like 3 seconds into the race it shows up and im overhedged about 7k and the horse which I thought had a good chance of winning / was value strolled to the front and the price collapsed IP.
